p: Several weaknesses of infectious disease surveillance and prediction systems described in previous decades [ 7] have still not been addressed in methods design. Responding to this situation, the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention (CDC) in the United States initiated the “predict the influenza season challenge” [ 8], which encouraged researchers to forecast features of winter influenza season progression that are useful to policy makers and to take advantage of big data resources.
